TopicTitle: Graphical glitches while using Astronomer Visual Pack and Parallax together

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I tried to install Parallax alone and everything is working well. Until I add Astronomer Visual Pack (manually or throuch CKAN, I tried two times from a fresh install) I get these glitches :

If I apply city default settings in EVE, glitches disappear, but once any other screen change occur (go to the VAB and come back to main screen), glitches are back.

I'm not sure if this have been mentionned before, I tried to search and didn't find anything about it.

 

I would be happy to resolve this as the rest looks to work wonderfully.

 

Thanks anyway.
It’s a known issue with Parallax interfering with EVE city lights, check the Parallax mod thread and maybe there’s a solution there?
Okay, thank you; Moving somewhere else city file in EvE folder/plugins did the trick. Apparently a new update come soon.
